metadata.description: After cheating death, Nola Thomas wakes up alone in a deserted New Orleans hospital. Bruised, broken, and badly burned, she emerges from the floodwaters of Hurricane Katrina with one thing on her mind - revenge. From Chris Gorak, the writer/director of the critically-acclaimed film, Right at Your Door! Covers by Erik Jones and Chris Brunner.
metadata.name: Nola
